titles.title: Dobbins Civil Engineering Support Act
Dobbins Civil Engineering Support Act
A bill to authorize the appropriation of amounts for the planning and design of a civil engineering group facility at Dobbins Air Reserve Base, Georgia.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Dobbins Civil Engineering Support Act
This bill authorizes FY2025 appropriations for the Department of Defense to plan and design a civil engineering group facility at Dobbins Air Reserve Base, Georgia.
